Articles.Content: Years ago I came across a website. Its some kind of puzzle. I became fascinated with it and did a little digging and found others who were trying to figure it out. And then, strangeness. I'm probably not doing you guys any favors sending you down this road but maybe you will do better than me. I'll just leave this here. http://forums.unfiction.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=29804
